name: Paradigm (itch) (Jonathan Lopes)
description:
Made during a 4 month development period, Paradigm is a short 2D puzzler that explores the relationship between two distinct dimensions. Using the power of an unknown relic, you explore the environment around you to try and discover the relationship between these two universes.

This game was a short project for at Niagara College Canada by a group of 6 developers in both Game Programming and Game Design programs, and won 2nd place at GD Launch; an annual gaming event held at Niagara College Canada.
